Package elements

Class DirectionalLight

java.lang.Object
elements.Light
elements.DirectionalLight
All Implemented Interfaces:
LightSource
public class DirectionalLight
extends Light
implements LightSource
direction light representing a light that is far and all light beams from it arr close enough as parallel
